ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Wooly Mammoths
ygData.msgSnippet: I may go there just to make money for my 38 ranger. 8pp per tusk sounds pretty damn good. Bet there are some quests in that area to do too. Permafrost is a
ygData.messageBody:
I may go there just to make money for my 38 ranger. 8pp per tusk sounds pretty damn good. Bet there are some quests in that area to do too. Permafrost is a deathtrap, in my exp.
----- Original Message -----
From: mlockridge01
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Friday, April 26, 2002 1:21 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Wooly Mammoths

Over eight pp per tusk for my druid halfling selling at home in
Rivervale. Pretty profitable and exp as well. Glad I moved to
Everfrost.

Did snoop into Permafrost. A bit tricky to solo. Would be better with
someone to watch my back. The goblins are refreshingly stout.
Actually got chased out of the zone by a pair of hard blues. I plan
to go in after a few specific items, but it is hard to stop hunting
those mammoths.

Barto Proudfoot
Halfling Druid lvl 31
Zeb server



Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
